text: Infant baptism, also known as pedobaptism, is the practice of baptizing ("christening") young children or infants. ==Related pages== *Anabaptists *Baptism *Believers baptism *Church == Other websites == *INFANT BAPTISM: How My Mind Has Changed by Dr. Dennis E. Johnson *Infant Baptism discussed at www.CatholicBridge.com *A Scriptural Critique of Infant Baptism by Pastor John MacArthur *The Assemblies of God on Baptism Category:Sacraments
title: Infant baptism
